column4: hello is there a way to copy a legally owned dvd to dvd-r ? i already know about dvd::rip but that does dvd to avi/ogg/mpeg i want to copy a dvd to burn to dvd-r format
you can try acid rip also its native to linux
i am looking to rip in iso and if possible just burn to a dvd-r if i have to re-author i can live with that too its the main movie that counts anyway not the extras
